overview:
Robert is a serial entrepreneur with international experience as a founder, CEO, board member and investor.

Areas of focus are mobile video and advertising, over-the-top (“OTT”) television and video, electronic program guides (“EPG”s), professional services, strategy consulting, intellectual property, and M&A (www.propeladvisors.com).

See Linked In bio in “Homepage URL” link above for more.
